<IIII> Affiliation reports: 1.Statement

Declaration of Consolidated Financial Statements of Affiliates

The Company is required to prepare consolidated financial statementsfor year 2017 (from January 1 to December 31, 2017) with its subsidiaries under the “Standards for the Preparation of Consolidated Report on Operation, Consolidated Financial Statements, and Report on Affiliations between Parent and Subsidiaries.” Subsidiaries to be included into the consolidated financial statements of the affiliates are identical with those to be included into the consolidated financial statements of parent and subsidiaries under IFRS 10, and operation performance of such subsidiaries has been included in the disclosure of the aforementioned consolidated financial statements of parent and subsidiaries and therefore will not be prepared separately.
